CustomField.description: Dwell time in time format for reporting purposes (requested by La Vall√©e)
CustomField.formula: IF( Experience_Close__c - Experience_Start__c > 0 , TEXT( FLOOR( MOD( (Experience_Close__c - Experience_Start__c ) * 24, 24 ) ) ) & " h " & TEXT( ROUND( MOD( (Experience_Close__c - Experience_Start__c ) * 24 * 60, 60 ), 0 ) ) & " min", "" )
CustomField.label: Dwell Time
